meanings.definition: The lowest floor of a building, typically below ground level.
meanings.sent1: Our house has a basement where we store old furniture.
meanings.sent2: The basement flooded during the heavy rainstorm.
meanings.sent3: The basement is like a hidden treasure trove of forgotten items.
meanings.sent4: In the basement of his mind, memories lay buried.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the basement felt like entering a secret underground world.

meanings.definition: A place or situation that is the lowest in rank or importance.
meanings.sent1: The basement of the company hierarchy rarely gets noticed.
meanings.sent2: His idea was dismissed and sent to the basement of consideration.
meanings.sent3: Being the last to be picked made him feel like the basement of the team.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence hit rock bottom, sinking to the basement of self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The forgotten book was relegated to the basement of the bookshelf.
